doc.field: Ferry and Statue of Liberty (going to Staten Island); Terminal Industries; Viewing Statue of Liberty (Window Reflections); Girl with dog; Docking Staten Island Side; Upper Deck (Shoe Shine with trio).

Ferry and Statue of Liberty (going to Staten Island); Terminal Industries; Viewing Statue of Liberty (Window Reflections); Girl with dog; Docking Staten Island Side; Upper Deck (Shoe Shine with trio).
6 black and white pigment prints, 11 x 14 in., all taken on the Staten Island Ferry. 4 images were a gift of Rosemarie Frisone, 2017; 2 images were purchased from the photographer, 2017
